I received the NBTHK AB translations of 'Elementary Course in Sword 
Furnit=
ure and Fittings (128)' on Mito Kinko by Fukushi Shigeo this 
morning and I=
 can see where you were coming from in your comments on 
the translation.  =
Work well done and much appreciated.  I have to laugh 
a bit at the title '=
Elementary' as it's very in depth and it really 
puts into perspective how =
much there is to learn in this field.  Not 
being able to read Japanese of =
course puts so much out of reach for so 
many of us that work such as yours=
 is most highly valued.  It also puts 
into perspective just how much schol=
arship there is in what men like 
Fukushi accomplish.  I will be looking fo=
rward to your future endeavors.
Pete Klein
PS:  To all -- if you are not a =
member of the NBTHK AB it is well worth 
it, IMHO.
